effects.display_string: Set: The duration of Devouring Plague is increased by 1.0 sec.
(4) Set: Devouring Plague increases your damage done by 2% for 10 sec, multiple applications may overlap.

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Void Bolt at an enemy at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dark Ascension or Void Eruption always hits a Jackpot!
(4) Set: Hitting a Jackpot! grants you 5.0 seconds of Power Infusion. Mind Blast, Void Blast, and Void Bolt deal 10% increased damage while Power Infusion is active.

(4) Set: Devouring Plague increases your damage done by 2% for 10 sec, multiple applications may overlap.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 158 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,099 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 91,327 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the cause of Tushui Pandaren.  All reputation gains while in dungeons will be applied to your standing with them.
